summary: A father and the former nanny to his children prepare a merger between his company and a European conglomerate.
cast: Gregory Harrison|Heidi Lenhart|Jake Dinwiddie|Katie Volding|Rachel York|Robin Dunne|June Lockhart|James Lancaster|Cliff Bemis|Celine Massuger|Rory Knox Johnston|Jan Preucil|Dan Brown|David O'Kelly|Jan Kuzelka|Vladimír Javorský|Karel Kohlicek|Ivo Niederle|Robert Russel|Larry Robbins|Behunek Lukas|Caitlin Griffiths|Bryan Noffz|Lex Robbins
title: Un niño de cuidado
